## OperationDiscarded class

Error thrown when a store modification is aborted because it doesn't change the state of the store.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class OperationDiscarded extends NotOK 
```
**Extends:** [NotOK](./core.notok.md)

## Remarks

Use the `allowUnchanged` request parameter to avoid throwing an error and return the current store version instead.

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `OperationDiscarded` class.
